caption.p: HPLC-DAD-MS/MS chromatograms of reference substances and a frankincense extract of B. sacra, Superior Hojari (sample # 1). ( a) Multiple reaction monitoring chromatogram of eight pentacyclic triterpenic acids (PTA) and maslinic acid used as an internal standard. ( b) Multiple reaction monitoring chromatogram of a B. sacra extract. ( c) Total wavelength chromatogram (210 nm, 254 nm, and 280 nm) of a B. sacra extract.
